item.description:
This is a great time. Music is from 6:30- 8 so come early --I am not sure I can make it -- please look for the orange cones with Al's group.
Bring food and drink to share, your beach blanket or chair. It is held rain or shine. A great way to enjoy Wed. night. It is free. Check out the group at http://www.tropicheat...

Elizabeth Park is located at the corner of Prospect Avenue and Asylum Avenue on the Hartford / West Hartford line.

I-84 West bound to Exit 48 (Asylum Street).

Stay to the Right on Asylum.

Follow for approximately 1.8 miles.

Turn left into the park (1555 Asylum Avenue, West Hartford).

I-84 East bound to Exit 44 (Prospect Ave)

Straight thru stop sign.

Left at light onto Prospect.

Follow approximately 1.8 miles.

Entrance on Left (915 Prospect, Hartford)
item.how_to_find_us: near the front at the arch of the rose garden

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Island Girl -- our beach party at Elizabeth Park
